[Gary] All right. Really appreciate the call.
[man] By the way, we put some gas in it. It's included on the bill.
translation.zh:
‎对了 我们给你加了点油 ‎-包含在账单里了
‎-好

translation.en: -[Gary] Oh, okay. Thank you. -Let me give you the receipt.
translation.zh:
‎-包含在账单里了
‎-好 ‎我给你开张收据吧

translation.en: [Gary] Okay, thank you. Here, sweetie.
translation.zh: ‎好 谢谢你 给 亲爱的

translation.en: Thanks, Gary. I really appreciate it.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你 加里 感激不尽

translation.en: Of course.
-I'm so sorry, I... It's weird. -No. Hey.
translation.zh:
‎-没问题
‎-真的很抱歉 ‎-好奇怪
‎-没事

translation.en: Car looks like it's in one piece. -You're okay? -Mmm-hmm.
translation.zh: ‎车看起来完好无损 你还好吧？

translation.en: You need anything? Do you need any more money?
No, no. [chuckles] No. Thank you.
-You tell me if you do. -Okay.
Hey, Gary...
How old was Mom when she... started acting like Helen?
translation.zh: ‎妈几岁的时候 ‎开始变得像海伦那样？

translation.en: She never acted like Helen. No.
Helen was... you know, she was talking to walls. That...
translation.zh: ‎不 海伦她… ‎她严重到会对着墙壁说话

translation.en: Your mom was... She struggled. She struggled sometimes.
translation.zh: ‎你妈妈 她挣扎过 ‎她有时候会挣扎

translation.en: Things became a little too much, you know?
translation.zh: ‎事情有时候会变得难以承受

translation.en: Why? Are you--
No. No. [chuckles] No.
Thanks. Love you.
Yeah. Hey. Happy belated birthday.
translation.zh: ‎有点晚 但祝你生日快乐

translation.en: All right, sweetie.
Hyah, boy.
-[Sarah] Oh. Hey, Joe! -Hyah!
Oh, hey there. [clicking tongue]
So, Emma's not taking Willow out today?
No, she's out of town. Out of town. Hyah!
You want me to take her out?
No. No. We're good. We're good.
-I mean, I'm here. -Hyah! I don't mind. Happy to give her some exercise.
translation.zh:
‎反正我也来了 我不介意
‎很乐意带它运动一下

translation.en: You know what, it's kind of an insurance thing,
and she's not your horse anymore.
Well, I'll just go by and... say hi and give her a little brush.
translation.zh: ‎那我就去打个招呼 给它刷个毛吧

translation.en: [exhales] Yeah. Okay.
Okay. Thanks, Joe.
Okay. Hyah!
[Sarah, softly] Hi, Willow.
Hi, beauty.
You gonna get a little rest today?
-Hey, Joe? -Hey.
-Willow's not wearing the-- -Oh! Wanna step outside, please? Thanks.
translation.zh:
‎-薇洛没戴着…
‎-麻烦你站到外面去

translation.en: Sorry. Um... Willow's not wearing that lanyard I made her.
translation.zh:
‎-谢谢
‎-抱歉 ‎薇洛没戴着我给它弄的挂绳

translation.en: -Do you know what happened to it? -What's that, now?
translation.zh: ‎你知道去哪儿了吗？ ‎你说什么呢？

translation.en: Remember, a couple of days ago, I-- I made her that lanyard for our birthdays?
translation.zh:
‎还记得前几天 我为我们俩的生日
‎给它弄了条挂绳吗？

translation.en: But I-- I can't find it.
You know, I don't know what that... I'm sure it'll turn up, though.
translation.zh: ‎不知道耶 但你肯定会找到的

translation.en: Okay.
-I'll see you around. -Yeah, all right.
[woman mutters] What the fuck?
Hi. Sorry. I think I was sleepwalking, 'cause my mom used to say
translation.zh: ‎嗨 抱歉 我应该是梦游了 ‎我妈以前常说我的想象力过度活跃

translation.en: -that I have an overactive imagin-- -[door closes]
translation.zh: ‎我妈以前常说我的想象力过度活跃

translation.en: Good night.
[man on speakers] Ah, I took her for a walk.
I distinctly remember the clock saying it was 6:00 p.m.,
translation.zh: ‎我清楚记得时钟显示着傍晚六点

translation.en: and saying hey to my neighbor Glenn who was on his porch.
translation.zh:
‎也记得我和站在家门前的邻居格伦
‎打了招呼

translation.en: And this was in the winter, so, you know, it was... it was dark outside already.
translation.zh: ‎那时候是冬天 所以外面天色已暗

translation.en: I came home, fed her, looked out the window, and bam, it was light outside.
translation.zh: ‎我回到家 喂了它 往窗外一看 ‎天竟然还亮着

translation.en: I looked at the clock again and it said 5:00 p.m.
translation.zh: ‎我又看了看时钟 上面显示傍晚五点

translation.en: [woman] Wow.
[man] Yeah. In my book, I interview several people with similar incidents
translation.zh:
‎在我的书中 我采访了一些
‎经历过类似事件的人

translation.en: that don't jive with our notions of reality.
translation.zh:
‎这些事件与我们所谓的现实
‎扯不上关系

translation.en: [woman] So, aliens?
[man] That's certainly one explanation. Alien abductions.
translation.zh: ‎这是其中一种解释 ‎被外星人绑架

translation.en: Accidentally slipping into parallel universes.
-[Sarah sighs] -Thought control.
30% employee discount just for you.
Thank you.
You're welcome. So, uh, Shannon's not here yet, but before she gets in,
translation.zh:
‎-谢谢
‎-不客气 ‎莎侬还没到 但在她进来之前

translation.en: would you mind taking a look at the glue?
She did it yesterday, but it's just a little...
Are... Are you okay?
I don't know. Um...
[inhales deeply] I just haven't been sleeping very well.
That's too bad.
Yeah, I've been having, like, really weird dreams.
translation.zh: ‎嗯 我老是做很奇怪的梦

translation.en: Really? About what?
Um... I don't know. Like...
Like, I've been seeing the same people over and over again.
translation.zh: ‎我不断重复地看到相同的人

translation.en: And, like, these strange places I've never been before.
translation.zh: ‎还有… ‎我不曾去过的奇怪地方

translation.en: And I don't know how to describe it, it just feels really weird.
translation.zh:
‎我不知道该怎么形容
‎但就是感觉很奇怪

translation.en: And, like, really scary.
That's horrible.
And, like... I've been having, like, weird things with time.
translation.zh: ‎而且… ‎我对时间的感知也怪怪的

translation.en: Weird things with time?
Like, finding myself places and I don't know how I got there.
translation.zh:
‎我会发现自己在某处
‎但却不知道自己怎么会在那里

translation.en: What... What does that mean, exactly?
Like, last night, I was gone for, like, 25 minutes,
and when I looked at the clock, it showed that only two minutes had passed.
translation.zh: ‎但我看了时钟 它显示才过了两分钟

translation.en: So, like, I did some research online, and people talk about, um,
translation.zh: ‎所以我上网查了一下 人们说的是

translation.en: carbon monoxide poisoning, but I just don't think it's that.
translation.zh: ‎一氧化碳中毒 但我不认为是如此

translation.en: And then they also talk about, um, alien abductions. Do you believe in that?
translation.zh: ‎然后他们还说了 ‎被外星人绑架 这你相信吗？

translation.en: No, I... Not really.
No?
Do you think this sounds similar to some of the stuff your mom went through?
translation.zh:
‎你觉得这听起来
‎与你妈经历的某些事情相似吗？

translation.en: No.
Maybe you should talk to a doctor, Sarah.
You know, get a professional opinion.
-What do you think? -Maybe.
[gasps] Joan! That's the guy from my dream.
[Joan] Really?
Yes!
[man] Turn it all off. It'll be the Dark Ages again!
translation.zh: ‎全都关掉 让黑暗时代再次降临

translation.en: [whispering] "Santiaguez."
[man] We'll all be gone except for those that are Sectilians that are...
that are in cahoots with Satico Satellite! God of technology!
translation.zh: ‎是一伙儿的外星昆虫人 ‎科技之神

translation.en: Sits at the right hand of Zeus!
Powering all your electronic devices!
Light bulbs! Email! Internet! Satico Satellite...
translation.zh: ‎电灯泡 电子邮件 互联网 ‎萨蒂科卫星

translation.en: -Tap. Good. Tap. Great! Tap. -[upbeat music playing]
translation.zh: ‎踏脚 好 踏脚 妙 踏脚 呱呱叫

translation.en: Excellent! Good. Very good!
Yes! Sweat out those margaritas!
Let's cha-cha! Back, back, back, and cha-cha!
translation.zh: ‎恰 向后退 恰恰 向后退

translation.en: Back, back, back, and pump, pump.
translation.zh: ‎恰 向后退 恰恰 向后退 ‎拉 拉 两下 拉 拉 两下

translation.en: Double. Now, pump, pump. Double. Good! Keep pulling! Yes!
translation.zh: ‎拉 拉 两下 拉 拉 两下 ‎很好 继续拉 臀部迎上拳头

translation.en: Match that hip to your fist. Very good.
translation.zh: ‎很好 继续拉 臀部迎上拳头 ‎非常棒

translation.en: Okay.
Hi. Can I help you?
Do you remember me?
Have you used us before?
I just wanted to talk to you.
Okay. About... plumbing? HVAC?
translation.zh: ‎好 谈关于… ‎管道？暖通空调？

translation.en: Plumbing.
Kitchen? Bathroom?
Kitchen.
Pipes. I need new pipes.
All right. Pipes.
Is that expensive?
Depends on the work. It's hard to tell until I check it out.
translation.zh: ‎取决于工程 得看一下才能知道

translation.en: Oh, you could come and check it out? I have money.
Oh, well, that's usually not necessary until I'm...
translation.zh: ‎那个 在我开工之前 通常没必要…

translation.en: -[Sarah] Here. -...at the job. Oh, okay.
Yeah. Sure. [chuckles]
Great. So you'll come check it out tonight?
translation.zh: ‎太好了 那你今晚过来看一下咯？

translation.en: Well, we're almost closed and dispatch is gone, so, um...
translation.zh: ‎我们快要打烊了 调度员也走了

translation.en: I can probably squeeze you in in the morning, though.
translation.zh: ‎但我应该能安排一下明早过去

translation.en: In the morning. Tomorrow morning. Great. So you'll come tomorrow morning?
translation.zh:
‎早上 明天早上
‎好 那你明早过来咯？

translation.en: [chuckles] You really want those pipes, huh?
Yeah.
All righty. I'll... just need some information.
Your name?
Agatha Kaine.
-[man, softly] Okay. -Tomorrow, then?
Yeah. Just need your address and phone number.
translation.zh: ‎对 还需要地址和电话号码

translation.en: Okay.
One... Mississippi.
Please, don't.
Two... Mississippi.
[Darren] Listen to your heart, Agatha.
Three... [demonic voice] Mississippi.
[Sarah] Clones.
Hey, Miss Kaine. I'm Tom from Santiaguez Plumbing.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 凯恩小姐 ‎我是圣地格斯管道公司的汤姆

translation.en: Yeah. It's good we're replacing this old galvanized pipe.
translation.zh: ‎换掉这些旧的镀锌管是件好事

translation.en: It's got tons of sclerosis.
Oh. Those are better?
Yeah. Copper's the best.
So, like, are you friends with any of the people you work with?
I don't know.
We get beers, like, once a month or something.
translation.zh: ‎我们偶尔会一起去喝杯啤酒

translation.en: What about the guy who made me this appointment?
That would be Ron. One of the owners.
He's one of the owners.
Does he work every day?
Yeah. Yeah, he's pretty much there all day.
translation.zh: ‎对 他基本上天天都在店里

translation.en: [whispers] Has he ever told you about anything weird that's happened to him? -That's like-- -[door opens]
translation.zh:
‎你有没有告诉过你
‎他经历了哪些奇怪的事？

translation.en: What? What is this? What's happening?
Hi. Nothing.
-[woman] What is going on? -Nothing.
What is he-- Hi. What are you doing?
translation.zh: ‎他在做什… 嗨 你在做什么？

translation.en: He's just replacing the pipes because we needed new pipes,
translation.zh:
‎他只是在换水管
‎我们需要新的水管

translation.en: our pipes are really old.
-You're replacing the pipes? -Yeah, and I paid for them!
translation.zh:
‎-你把水管换掉了？
‎-对 我付钱了

translation.en: We're renting. I asked you to fix the scratches on the wall.
translation.zh: ‎这房子是租的 ‎我让你把墙上的划痕修好

translation.en: We don't need new plumbing.
Mmm. Can you just put it back how it was?
Miss Kaine, I-- I don't know if I'm authorized to do that, I mean--
translation.zh:
‎凯恩小姐 我不知道
‎我是否有权这样做

translation.en: Miss Kaine?
-[Tom] Plus, they're all gunked up-- -[woman] What did you call her? What?
translation.zh:
‎-而且全都很脏
‎-你刚叫她什么？

translation.en: [Tom] Agatha Kaine?
-[shushing] Listen. -Are you using an alias?
Listen. Everything's fine.
He's gonna finish doing the floors, and I already paid for it,
translation.zh: ‎他会把地板铺好 我已经付钱了

translation.en: and he's gonna put the floor back the way it was.
translation.zh: ‎他会把地板铺成原先的样子

translation.en: And I-- I even called the guy about the walls,
translation.zh:
‎我甚至还打了电话给维修工
‎他说下周才能来

translation.en: and he said he can't come until next week, so, it's-- it's all taken care of.
translation.zh:
‎我甚至还打了电话给维修工
‎他说下周才能来 ‎一切都处理好了

translation.en: Fine. This is fucking insane.
So, is Ron working tonight?
Okay. Here we go, now.
-It's gonna sting just a little bit. -[hisses]
And... And there we go.
All done. Great. I think we got it.
translation.zh: ‎完成了 非常好 ‎没问题了

translation.en: -You did great. -Oh, good.
translation.zh: ‎你做得很棒 ‎太好了 谢谢你

translation.en: -Thank you. -Okay.
Um... And if... If I should get another nosebleed,
should I lean my head back or should I lean it forward?
translation.zh: ‎我是应该把头往后仰还是往前倾啊

translation.en: Yeah, always forward. Because if you lean your head back,
translation.zh: ‎总是向前倾 如果你把头往后仰的话

translation.en: then the blood is gonna flow down the back of your throat,
and then you'll get nauseous and throw up,
translation.zh: ‎你会感到恶心 然后呕吐

translation.en: and you don't want that to happen.
-[Sarah] Okay. -Okay? Good.
Um... And I've been having a little trouble sleeping,
'cause I've been having these really weird dreams,
translation.zh: ‎因为我老是做这些很奇怪的梦

translation.en: and I've been kind of scared to go to sleep.
-Uh-huh. -And now I have some bruises on my body.
Do you know what that could be from?
Well, um, you know, a bruise like that could really be from anything.
translation.zh: ‎会出现这种淤青的原因可多了

translation.en: You might've bumped into something, even if you didn't know that you did.
translation.zh: ‎可能是撞到了什么 只是自己不知道

translation.en: Uh, you know what would be a good idea, Sarah, for you?
translation.zh: ‎我有个好建议给你 莎拉

translation.en: I think you should get, uh, some blood work done through your GP,
translation.zh: ‎你应该去见见全科医生 做个血检

translation.en: um, and ask them to test for, uh, anemia.
Um... Partly because of the, uh... the nosebleeds you've been having.
translation.zh: ‎部分原因是因为你一直流鼻血

translation.en: if there's any coagulation problem,
translation.zh: ‎如果发现有凝血方面的问题

translation.en: that could-- that could tell you something about the bruises as well.
translation.zh: ‎这也能解释你身上出现的淤青

translation.en: Okay?
-Okay. -All right. Okay. Good.
Is there also a test, um, like, to see if I'm a clone?
translation.zh:
‎是否也有什么检查
‎能查看我是不是克隆体啊？

translation.en: Uh, I'm sorry?
Um, just a test to see if I'm, like, a clone?
translation.zh: ‎就检查一下我是不是克隆体

translation.en: A clone? [chuckles]
Well, I guess the one way to do that is we'd, uh, take your DNA test,
translation.zh:
‎我想其中一个方法
‎是拿你的DNA检测结果

translation.en: and we'd take the DNA test of the other person,
translation.zh: ‎和另一个人的DNA检测结果核对一下

translation.en: and if they match,
then you've got a clone. [chuckles]
That's the only way I know.
Well, just 'cause I've been watching season five of Purgatory
translation.zh: ‎因为我之前看《炼狱》第五季的时候

translation.en: where Darren becomes a clone, and...
translation.zh: ‎达伦变成了克隆体 ‎而这不禁让我想到了

translation.en: it just sort of got me thinking
that, like, I look so much like my grandma,
and I have all these old photos of her, and, like, we look exactly the same,
translation.zh:
‎我有她以前的照片
‎我们长得一模一样

translation.en: and I can even sort of make the face she makes in the photos,
translation.zh:
‎而且我甚至能做出
‎她在照片里的脸部表情

translation.en: and, like... uh... So, that would make sense,
translation.zh:
‎那么… ‎这么一来就说得通了
‎因为我不认识她

translation.en: 'cause... I didn't know her. She was gone before I was born.
translation.zh:
‎这么一来就说得通了
‎因为我不认识她 ‎我出生前她就走了

translation.en: So maybe they would have needed her body
translation.zh:
‎所以如果我是她的克隆体的话
‎他们可能需要她的身体

translation.en: to, like, recycle it into me if I was a clone of her.
translation.zh:
‎所以如果我是她的克隆体的话
‎他们可能需要她的身体 ‎来再生成我

translation.en: And I don't know who... would be doing it, like...
it could be the government, or demons, or...
um, immortal alchemists, like Dee on Purgatory.
translation.zh:
‎或者永生的炼金术士
‎像《炼狱》的迪伊一样

translation.en: [sighs] I just wanted to see if maybe we could, um, test for that.
translation.zh: ‎我只是想知道是否有办法查一下

translation.en: Uh, yeah. Um, Sarah, I'm...
I'm an ear, nose, and throat specialist, that's my area of expertise.
translation.zh:
‎我是耳鼻喉科专家
‎那是我擅长的领域

translation.en: So, I don't really know a lot about some of this other stuff.
translation.zh: ‎所以你说的这些 我其实并不太了解

translation.en: It doesn't sound very likely to me.
And I'm not familiar with Purgatory, uh, whatever you mentioned, the series.
translation.zh:
‎而且你说的《炼狱》这个电视剧
‎我也不太熟悉

translation.en: Um... You know what might be a good idea, is for you to, uh, talk to someone,
translation.zh:
‎不过我有个好主意
‎你应该找个人谈谈

translation.en: to talk to a psychologist and--
-Never mind. -No, and tell them--
Okay. That's okay. Um...
-I'm so sorry. Thank you. -[doctor] Mmm.
Um, okay. Thank you. Bye.
Hey. [chuckles]
Hi.
You look beautiful.
So do you.
Thanks.
-[music plays softly] -[Darren] I just wanna say, um...
I am so sorry for talking about my ex for so long the other night.
translation.zh:
‎那天晚上喋喋不休讲我前女友的事
‎真的很抱歉

translation.en: It's okay.
No. No, no. It's not. I mean...
translation.zh: ‎不 有关系 ‎我那样真是太没劲了

translation.en: It's, like, the lamest thing that I could do,
and I don't wanna give you the impression that I'm, like, hung up on my ex.
translation.zh:
‎而且我不想让你误以为
‎我还对她念念不忘

translation.en: 'Cause I'm not. I'm not, and it--
I've really enjoyed spending time with you, and... that's where my head's at.
translation.zh:
‎我真的很喜欢和你在一起
‎我是这么想的

translation.en: I totally get it.
Like... after my mom died,
I, like, rewatched every episode of Purgatory,
translation.zh:
‎我把每一季每一集的《炼狱》
‎都重看了一遍

translation.en: like, every season, and, um...
translation.zh:
‎我把每一季每一集的《炼狱》
‎都重看了一遍 ‎而那真的给我带来了慰藉

translation.en: it just, like, really comforted me.
Like, I don't think it's a coincidence that your name is Darren.
translation.zh: ‎我不认为你的名字叫达伦是个巧合

translation.en: [chuckles] Yeah.
I'm sorry to hear about your mom.
But, uh, I'm glad that you had the show to keep you company,
translation.zh: ‎但我很高兴你有那部电视剧陪着你

translation.en: 'cause... I know how hard that can be.
And, like, I wanted to tell you that, um, you don't have to worry about me getting nosebleeds ever again,
translation.zh:
‎还有 我想告诉你
‎你不用担心我会再流鼻血了

translation.en: because, um, I went to the doctor and I got my nose fixed.
translation.zh: ‎因为我去了医生那里 把鼻子治好了

translation.en: Uh... I thought the nosebleed was cute, but...
Well, I'm glad you got it fixed.
translation.zh: ‎但我很高兴你把它治好了 那很棒

translation.en: -So, that's great. -Yeah, it is great,
translation.zh:
‎但我很高兴你把它治好了 那很棒 ‎嗯 很棒 但我永远都不会
‎再去找那个医生了

translation.en: except I'll never be seeing that doctor again, so...
translation.zh:
‎嗯 很棒 但我永远都不会
‎再去找那个医生了

translation.en: [Darren] Why? What happened?
He's just, like, a jerk.
He, like, make fun of you or something?
I was just, like, talking about him about the paranormal and stuff, and, like,
translation.zh: ‎我只是跟他聊了超自然现象之类的事

translation.en: he just made me feel like such an idiot
translation.zh:
‎但他却让我觉得
‎只有白痴才会说这种东西

translation.en: -for even bringing it up, and-- -What an asshole.
translation.zh:
‎但他却让我觉得

translation.en: Because I'm feeling it. Like, the same thing is happening to me.
translation.zh:
‎因为我也感觉到了
‎同样的事正在我身上重演

translation.en: And she was in a place like this. She got put in a place like this.
translation.zh: ‎而且她也被送进了这种地方

translation.en: And then, you know, Reagan closed down all the hospitals,
translation.zh: ‎后来里根总统关闭了所有精神病院

translation.en: and she got put out on the street, and she died as, like,
a homeless woman... in the streets.
translation.zh: ‎她变成了流浪女沦落街头 ‎最后死在街上

translation.en: I'm sorry.
Um, what about your mom? Did she have similar issues?
translation.zh: ‎那你妈呢？她有类似的问题吗？

translation.en: [tearfully] No. My mom had depression.
[voice breaks] My mom...
She... [sniffles]
Mom was just, like, really depressed, and she killed herself... [sobs] ...last year.
translation.zh: ‎我妈很抑郁 去年自杀了

translation.en: I found her in her bathroom.
She was just really depressed. She, um...
She took a lot of pills.
[Ethan] I'm really sorry. Um...
How about your dad? Is he around?
No. [sniffles]
No. I didn't have a dad. He was...
I mean, Gary raised me. I thought Gary was my dad, but...
translation.zh:
‎我是加里养大的
‎我以为加里是我亲爸爸 但…

translation.en: he left when I was, like, 16.
And who's Gary?
Mmm. He was my mom's husband.
-He's her ex-husband. -[Ethan, quietly] Okay.
[Ethan sighs] You've been through a lot.
I want you to know that, um...
I-- I believe that you're telling me your truth
translation.zh: ‎我相信你所告诉我的 是你的真相

translation.en: and that what you're experiencing feels 100% real to you,
translation.zh:
‎而你所经历的
‎对你来说感觉绝对真实

translation.en: um, and I appreciate your honesty, I really do.
translation.zh:
‎我很感谢你的坦诚 真的
‎我能感受到这一点

translation.en: I can feel that from you, and that's gonna go a long way
translation.zh:
‎我很感谢你的坦诚 真的
‎我能感受到这一点 ‎而那将大大有助于我们实现最终目标

translation.en: in terms of, um, where we wanna go.
translation.zh: ‎而那将大大有助于我们实现最终目标

translation.en: But I also wanna just say, for the sake of our rapport...
translation.zh: ‎但为了我们的友好关系 我还想说

translation.en: [chuckles] ...uh, that I... I am a bit skeptical of alien abductions and cloning,
translation.zh: ‎我对外星人绑架和克隆是存有疑虑的

translation.en: -um, but I-- -[Sarah] Me, too.
I know that it sounds crazy. Okay?
translation.zh: ‎我知道听起来很疯狂 好吗？

translation.en: I know it sounds really crazy, but it just feels really real
translation.zh:
‎我知道听起来很疯狂
‎但对我来说感觉很真实 好吗？

translation.en: -to me, okay? -[Ethan] Yeah. Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎我知道听起来很疯狂
‎但对我来说感觉很真实 好吗？ ‎好

translation.en: And I just...
I just wish that I could... start over.
We don't-- We don't need to go back or start over.
translation.zh: ‎我们不需要回头或者重新开始

translation.en: We can start from right here, and, um...
You know, we've had great success here, and we have an incredible team.
translation.zh:
‎我们这里有很高的成功率
‎也有很棒的团队

translation.en: And we-- I and they are 100% committed to helping you.
[Sarah] Where's Ethan?
He said he'd watch me sleep.
[nurse] Ethan already left for the night.
translation.zh: ‎伊桑已经走了 今晚不会回来

translation.en: Don't worry, Sarah, we have a full staff, you'll be safe.
translation.zh: ‎别担心 莎拉 ‎所有人员都在 你很安全

translation.en: Try and get some rest, it'll be good for you.
translation.zh: ‎好好休息吧 对你有好处的

translation.en: Okay, Sarah, have a good night.
Where have you been? Are you okay?
Hello? Just talk to me, just tell me where you went.
translation.zh: ‎喂 跟我说话啊 告诉我你去了哪里

translation.en: -[softly] Who are you? -What do you mean, who am I?
-Why are you wearing Nikki's clothes? -These are my clothes.
translation.zh: ‎你为什么穿着妮琪的衣服？ ‎这些是我的衣服

translation.en: Okay, just tell me how you got out.
translation.zh: ‎快告诉我你是怎么跑出去的

translation.en: -What happened? -Where are my fabrics?
What do you mean, "fabrics"? Why are you...
You're not Nikki.
-[scoffs] What? -No, you're wearing her clothes.
-Why are you acting like this? -Get away from me.
-Get away from me. -What do you mean, "Get away"?
translation.zh:
‎-离我远点 你不是妮琪
‎-什么叫离你远点

translation.en: -You're not Nikki. No! -I'm trying to help you!
translation.zh: ‎我想帮你 告诉我你去了哪里

translation.en: -Tell me where you went! -No!
translation.zh:
‎我想帮你 告诉我你去了哪里 ‎-不！
‎-开门！

translation.en: -Open up! -No!
Let me help you!
Open this fucking door!
-Open this door! -[banging continues]
-Open it! -[exhales sharply]
Hey.
What are you doing here?
I have to keep her safe.
[breathing heavily] Get out of here.
Get out of here!
Get out of here!
[Sarah whispering] Wake up, Ron.
Wake up.
[Sarah] I've never seen him like that before.
Yeah.
-[Sarah] He was so angry. -[Darren] Yeah.
[Sarah] It was so scary.
You have nothing to be afraid of.
-Okay. -I'm here for you.
Yeah.
[Darren] I love you.
[softly] Hi.
[Sarah] Hi.
Were you just in my bed?
Why are you in my fucking bed?
[whispers] It's you.
Why are you here?
I really don't wanna talk about that with you.
[Sarah] Please.
Sorry. I really...
just wanna go back to sleep.
[Sarah] I'm just trying to figure out what's going on.
I know. I-- I understand. I just don't wanna talk about it.
translation.zh: ‎我知道 我明白 我只是不想聊那件事

translation.en: Listen to me, listen to me, listen to me.
I know you.
I know you from somewhere that's not... here.
Do you remember me?
I would like to go back to sleep.
Please. Please, tell me. Just...
tell me.
What happened is that I went to sleep in fucking 1995,
translation.zh: ‎发生的事情是 1995年我去睡个觉

translation.en: and I woke up and all the buildings are different.
translation.zh: ‎醒来时 所有建筑物都变得不一样了

translation.en: I can't find anyone I know. I can't find where I'm supposed to be.
translation.zh:
‎我找不到认识的人
‎找不到我该去的地方

translation.en: Nothing makes sense.
And every time I tell anybody that, they look at me like I'm fucking crazy,
translation.zh:
‎每当我告诉别人时
‎他们都把我当疯子看

translation.en: 'cause that's a crazy thing to say.
And now you think I'm crazy.
translation.zh:
‎现在连你也觉得我疯了
‎我们俩都在这里

translation.en: -And we're both fucking here! -You're not crazy.
translation.zh:
‎现在连你也觉得我疯了
‎我们俩都在这里 ‎你没疯

translation.en: You're not crazy.
My grandmother thought she was from the future
and nobody believed her.
-They can take us to other times. -Who can?
translation.zh: ‎它们能带我们穿越时空 ‎它们是谁？

translation.en: We're being abducted.
Oh, my God.
[Sarah] At the same time. No, no, no, no. Please listen to me.
translation.zh: ‎同时 不 拜托你听我说

translation.en: There's a white space.
There's-- There's-- There's a ramp floating over the ocean.
There's-- There's-- There's the, like, fingers.
How do you know about the ramp?
[Sarah] You've seen it.
Yeah, that's the dream I have all the time.
How do you know about that?
It's not a dream.
[woman] How do you know about that dream?
How do you know about that? I've never told you that.
translation.zh: ‎你是怎么知道的？我没告诉过你

translation.en: I believe you.
[Ethan] Well, good morning.
-Morning. -How are you feeling?
-Good. -[chuckles]
-Yeah. -Good.
I'm feeling much better having gotten some sleep.
And... I know I'm not a clone.
translation.zh: ‎还有 我知道我不是克隆体

translation.en: And I think I... figured a lot of stuff out.
translation.zh: ‎而且我觉得我想通了很多事情

translation.en: Okay.
Uh, sounds like you're making good progress.
Um... Well, um, I have some good news.
Um... You've been here almost 72 hours
translation.zh: ‎你在这里待了将近72个小时了

translation.en: and, um, Dr. Fung has decided to discharge you today.
-So you're gonna be going-- -I've only been here one night.
translation.zh:
‎-所以你将会去…
‎-我才在这里待了一晚

translation.en: Um, well... It's been almost three days.
Um... But it's, uh...
Look, a lot of times when people come in for the first time,
translation.zh: ‎有很多时候 人们第一次来

translation.en: their brains are adjusting for a while,
and it's not abnormal that you wouldn't remember everything, so...
translation.zh: ‎不能记住所有事情也是很正常的

translation.en: That actually makes a lot of sense.
It's like how you told me yesterday that I had... met you before, a few weeks ago.
translation.zh:
‎就像你昨天告诉我
‎我们几周前见过面一样

translation.en: I'm sorry, I didn't-- I said--
translation.zh:
‎-抱歉 不 我是说…
‎-完全讲得通

translation.en: It totally works. Remember how I was telling you that
translation.zh:
‎-抱歉 不 我是说…
‎-完全讲得通 ‎还记得我说过我在梦里和绑架中
‎看到一个男人吗？

translation.en: there was a guy I was seeing in my dream and, like, in the abductions,
translation.zh:
‎还记得我说过我在梦里和绑架中
‎看到一个男人吗？

translation.en: but there was a girl there, too.
And that girl was my roommate here, and she remembers the abductions, too,
translation.zh:
‎那个女孩是我这里的室友
‎她也记得绑架的事

translation.en: because we were both waking up, but Ron, the guy, wasn't,
translation.zh:
‎因为我们俩都在过程中醒来
‎但那个男人罗恩并没有

translation.en: so he doesn't remember anything.
And they brought her here from another time. So, like...
translation.zh: ‎她是从另一个时空被带过来的

translation.en: it all makes sense, it's-- it's like a loop, it's continual.
translation.zh:
‎一切都说得通了
‎这是个循环 是连接不断的

translation.en: It-- It-- It has to happen.
I'm not a clone.
I am my grandmother.
It's actually kinda beautiful. [chuckles]
Okay.
Um... Who's the girl that you talked to?
Do you think I imagined the girl in my room?
translation.zh:
‎你觉得我房间里的女孩
‎是我想象出来的吗？

translation.en: No. I-- I actually don't know anything about the room assignments, I just--
translation.zh: ‎不是的 我对房间怎么分配一无所知

translation.en: You know, I-- I'm here...
and, uh, I just would've hoped that you would refrain from taking advice from other patients.
translation.zh: ‎而我希望你不会听取其他病人的建议

translation.en: Well, it's not advice, it's just the truth.
Okay.
Um... Well,
this will all be in your paperwork, but I wanna highlight,
translation.zh:
‎这些全都会写进你的报告里
‎但我想强调

translation.en: I-- I made an appointment for you, um,
translation.zh: ‎我替你在福克斯黑文诊所做了预约

translation.en: over at the Fox Haven Clinic, it's on Green Street,
translation.zh: ‎我替你在福克斯黑文诊所做了预约 ‎就位于格林街 是免费的

translation.en: and, um, it's-- it's free,
translation.zh: ‎就位于格林街 是免费的

translation.en: and it's your choice whether you wanna go or not, but, um...
translation.zh: ‎去不去是你的选择 但是…

translation.en: Uh, I-- I really... hope that you go.
Because I have high hopes for you.
And, uh, I'm-- I'm rooting for you,
and I think it'd be very important for you to follow up with that.
translation.zh: ‎而我觉得继续复诊对你来说非常重要

translation.en: Thanks, Ethan.
I know what I need to do.
Well...
what is-- what is your plan?
[Cheryl] I'm not gonna pay to have them fixed,
but I wanna be able to... bite off asparagus.
I can't bite asparagus 'cause it just goes right through my teeth.
translation.zh:
‎我没办法咬芦笋
‎因为它会直接穿过我牙缝

translation.en: [Joe] Well, I thought you had those, uh...
those plates put on your teeth, those-- What do you call them? Ooh, come on.
translation.zh:
‎那个放在牙齿上的东东
‎叫什么来着？ ‎走吧

translation.en: -[Cheryl] No, the-- My mouthguard? -[Joe] Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎我的牙套吗？ ‎-对
‎-我不戴那东西

translation.en: -[Cheryl] I don't wear that. -[Joe] That's just for snoring, or...
translation.zh:
‎-对
‎-我不戴那东西 ‎那只是用来防打鼾的吗？

translation.en: [softly] Hey, my girl.
Hi.
I came back for you.
My sweet girl. Look what I brought you.
translation.zh: ‎我的甜心 看我给你带了什么

translation.en: Hey.
Let's go.
I'll always protect you.
I love you.
